name: Ratscoin
description: RATSCOIN is a hyper-deflationary token that has a smart exchange system built into the ecosystem. Goose Loki Cat automatically sends RATSCOIN rewards directly to your wallet. He is Hyper-deflationary with static reflection that rewards holders, so more baby Rats coins are being automatically added to your wallet each transaction. Simply Love, pet, and hold as 2% from each transaction is automatically redistributed to RATSCOIN holders.
